Questions = Post in #build discusion https://discord.gg/MJXp6Q6
You can swap the endgame body armours to:
- Skin of the Lord/Loyal (^xE05030PLEASE^7 GOD READ THE ^xE05030KEYSTONE^7 CHOICE IT WILL FUCK YOUR BUILD IF YOU DON'T READ)
- Corrupted +2 AOE/Duration (or +1 socketed gems if using empower): - Cloak of Flame - MUCH ^xAF6025Easier^7 gearing with the 60% fire resistance - Lightning Coil - MUCH MUCH ^xAF6025Harder^7 gearing with the -60% lightning resistance - allows the evasion mastery for 15% suppression - drop suppression on shield and get resistances super tight everywhere

Skill.label: Level 16/18 - NEW SETUP Cold Snap + CF
Level 18 - NEW SETUP CF + Cold Snap
Aura - Add Defiance Banner When U Have Mana
Weapon 2: It's OK if you can't use yet
Body: Main Damage - EMPOWER 3 IF POOR
Boots: Shield Charge - Culling - Flame Dash
